00051 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 #define LCD_RAM_BIT(com,seg)    {((com*2)+(seg/32)),(seg%32)}
00053 
00054 #define _1A             LCD_RAM_BIT(0,2)
